level.heading: Filing of claim with Mayor for abandoned property.
level.text: Any person, excluding a state, claiming an interest in any property paid or delivered to the Mayor under this chapter may file a claim to the property or to the net proceeds from its sale. The claim must be on a form prescribed by the Mayor and must be verified by the claimant.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 41-101.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 24(a) of the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act (1981 Act). See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
